PHP Manual

Serializable::unserialize

(PHP 5 >= 5.1.0)

Serializable::unserialize — Constructs the object

Description

abstract public mixed Serializable::unserialize ( string $serialized )

Called during unserialization of the object.

Note:

This method acts as the constructor of the object. The __construct() method will not be called after this method.

Parameters

serialized

The string representation of the object.

Return Values

Returns the original value unserialized.

See Also

  • __wakeup()
